ME!!

Hi! I’m Saurabh. I love programming and contributing open source. I believe in the power to spread ideas, build communities and engage with people. Right now, I am a Google Summer of Code student in Ruby organization. This website is a result of my fascination for web designing. I want to save my GsoC journey and personal experiences in blogs to relive it again and again.


I am originally from India. When I am not making magic with my code, you’re likely to find me exploring nature and hanging out with my friends.
